# `ha` <img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="102" alt="" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of `ha` is to .control your HomeAssistant from your R session.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `ha` from [GitHub](https://github.com/christopherkenny/ha) with:

``` r
# install.packages('pak')
pak::pak('christopherkenny/ha')
```

## Controlling your smart home

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(ha)
## basic example code
```
